titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income up to the first $50,000 wages from employment as a K-12 public school teacher.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income up to the first $50,000 wages from employment as a K-12 public school teacher.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
